post.body: Wheeee! Welcome to the Roo club... That's a Roo shopper, btw... where's the totes? Hehehe.
I'm not on leave... yet. In fact, I cancelled some of my leave. :o(
Who so mean?!?! *looks angry* But do take care ya... esp. late at night... o.0
Oh dear! How come kena flat tire wan?
As long as you're delivering in your work, I don't think it should matter what you do while you work. But that's just my stand la.
Ooo... sounds like that person has double standards. =)
I can't believe I just discovered the incredible usefulness of TweetDeck yesterday! =) Now I just gotta find the time to explore.
I think you can use TweetDeck to segment who you follow into groups... that way you won't miss out on the really important tweets!
I actually like reading all the tweets I get, but if I'm pressed for time, I'll just read the replies. =)
Cos' I really need to finish off my projects... boss put deadline as end of the year mah... samore it's my KPI... affects d bonus
Yes, the same thing happened to me this morning also... alarm went off at 5:45am but I only got moving 1 hour later. Hurhurhur...
Ya... I cancelled 3 days of leave next week, thereby giving me some breathing space to continue saving the world. Heheheheh.
Forgot to add... lucky you to be still half asleep at this time... *envy*
Like hello? I is at work since like 7:30am leh... yup, still bent on saving the world before I go on holiday...
Happy Opening Day! So when can I pop over this evening??? When are you ready for visitors? =)
Blog blog blog blog blog! Hehehe.
Yup, I know, but what bugs is that I'd already told the caller the person she's trying to reach is not in, call mobile... 3 times.
My theme for 2009 is Year of Rediscovery. I need to get to know myself again. =)
You shy? Where got shy? Kekekekekeke!
But I'm a bit freaky in a nice way, yes? Hehehehe.
knows she can't control other people's behaviour, but she really hates that selfish, rude person who spoilt the X'mas party. #$^@#!!!!
is attending her company's Christmas party now! (btw, I organized it meself)
is not as high as she would like to feel... why ah liddat? :o(
is having dinner with @joannasaw in the new Tropicana City Mall...
is gonna go hang out with @joannasaw later... once the eternal KL traffic problem clears up a bit more...
New blogpost : "rediscovery goal #1 - be a better cook" at http://tinyurl.com/a63slc
just finished watching Iron Man. 1) Yes, I'm late in watching it. 2) The Dark Knight was waaaay better. 3) It's a boy's show. 'Nuff said.
wonders why the older generation won't call mobiles but persist in calling landline numbers. Tiring leh to run down the stairs to answer!
finished watching yet another episode of House, M.D. Nice!
Lunch is home! Woot! Now to immerse myself in a good book...
New blogpost : "year 2009 life-theme" at http://tinyurl.com/9mc7uw
just deleted like 89 spam comments from her personal blog. Now to do the same for her consumer views blog! *phew*
is going on a roadtrip today. Man, 2009 is off to an early start!
Happy New Year 2009, peeps!
is waiting for dinner... then, countdown to the new year!
Eyes stinging, burning. Ouchie! :(
is feeling a bit depressed. I wonder why?
had a long lunch to end the working year... now to buckle down to business for a few more hours before I'm finally free, babeh!
is back at her office workstation. Kinda miss my little spot in the world. It's mine, ya know? And no, I don't like people moving my stuff.
should be sleeping cos she is going back to office for one day tomorrow but is still awake surfing and twittering. Haih.
